info.name: Sales Orders
info.description:
Sales Order - OData Examples
============================

Examples to create and change sales orders using SAP Business ByDesign Custom OData Services.

Required user authorizations (ByD Work Center Views):
- *Sales Orders - Sales Orders*

Sales order origin type codes (*DataOriginTypeCode*):
- 1 - Manual data entry
- 4 - Internet order (webshop integration)

request.description:
Data Origin Type Code: 1 - Manual data entry, 4 - Internet order.

Attachment Category Codes: 2 - Document, 3 - Link.

Attachment Type Codes: 10076 - Pro Forma Invoice, 10001 - Standard Attachment.

Attachment binaries are base64 encoded.
